casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. William T. Evans (12547)

Foti, Landau and Cretella, Js.

Argued April 28 decision released May 17, 1994 Beth A. Hogan, with whom, on the brief, was Peter Scillieri, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Kevin T. Kane, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was C. Robert Satti, Sr., state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
